issue.title: C++: Implement DictionaryBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1160](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1160). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that we have a hash table inside of Arrow, I would start to implement a DictionaryBuilder for primitive types based on the AdaptiveIntBuilder.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1160?focusedCommentId=16065770) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I didn't move the dictionary encoder from `parquet/encoding.h` but it should be easy enough to adapt (didn't make sense to move to Arrow because it run-length encodes the indices)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1160?focusedCommentId=16071794) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 792
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/792>
